alpha-2.2.3.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.3
content: - Hotkeys 'm' for map and 'p' for profile
- Admins and moderators name now displays a different colour

alpha-2.2.4.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.4
content: - Map updates and loading time improvements
- Armour and weapon stats for all items
- Added default price to majority of items

alpha-2.2.5.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.5
content: - Fixes health bar resetting when logging out
- Minor fixes to the UI animations
- Respawn duration changes to Skeleton King and Ogre Lord
- A lot of game engine improvements and preparations for new content ;)

alpha-2.2.6.title: Kaetram alpha-2.2.6
content: - Added stop movement by pressing ESC
- Added attack last target by pressing 't'
- Client backend work, support for special effects and more
